parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the un[[localize]]d text value of an object's side / a group's side or a side as:

* [[east]], [[opfor]] - "East" 
* [[west]], [[blufor]] - "West"
* [[resistance]], [[independent]] - "Resistance"
* [[civilian]] - "Civilian"
* [[sideUnknown]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideEnemy]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideFriendly]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideLogic]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideEmpty]] - "Unknown"
* [[sideAmbientLife]] - "Unknown"

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''WFSideText''' param

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> param: [[Object]], [[Group]] or [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] - unlocalized side text value

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <Code>[[WFSideText]] [[player]];</Code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <Code>[[WFSideText]] [[group]] [[player]];</Code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <Code>[[WFSideText]] [[west]]</Code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[side]], [[localize]], [[isLocalized]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
